name: Big Agnes Big Six Arm Chair
description: Relax at basecamp in your deluxe throne. The tall back and wide seat are supportive and comfortable, and dual cupholders accommodate double-fisting wherever you set up for the night. The frame uses colour-coded pieces connected with shock-cord for easy set up, even when it's dark.100-denier Robic™ nylon with 300-denier polyester ripstop in high-wear areas.Ultra-lightweight aluminum poles holds up to 136kg.Colour-coded frame is quick and easy to set up.Seat height is 51cm from ground.Includes stuff sack.
